name: Chillbo Inflatable Couch – Cool Inflatable Chair. Upgrade Your Camping Accessories. Easy Setup is Perfect for Hiking Gear, Beach Chair and Music Festivals.

Ultra-Portable, Lightweight & Adventure-Ready – Take the Chillbo Shwaggins inflatable couch anywhere! Weighing just 3 lbs and folding into a small carry bag, it’s perfect for hiking, camping, festivals, or beach days. name: Inflatable Couch, Inflatable Chair Camping Accessories for Camping Pool Beach, Portable Lightweight Air Mattress, Easy Setup Inflatable Lounger for Hiking, Beach Chair and Music Festivals
short_description: Durable and tear-resistant: Our inflatable sofa is made of durable waterproof polyester with tear-resistant function. Our inflatable beach chair is designed for long-distance travel to ensure you get lasting comfort on all your wild adventures.

Easy Inflating - No pump required. Just blow the inflatable sofa into the air to inflate. The little trick is that you need to close the cuffs at the end of each move to retain air, and keep your mouth closed until you start the next move.

Portable and comfortable: iCapeson inflatable sofa is perfect for everything from beach lounge chairs to comfortable inflatable lounge chairs on quiet mountain tops. Lightweight, compact, stylish, and there is also a bag to store your inflatable chair to maximize convenience and style. It can also be used as a lazy sofa indoors for quick comfort.

Leak-proof design: Our inflatable sofa can retain air for at least 5-6 hours. Over time, you can tighten the seal again to keep the airbed compact. Perfect for camping, hiking, barbecue, beach or music festivals/travel/outdoors. If you have any product problems, you can contact our after-sales staff, you can buy with confidence.

product_description: ◎ Inflated Size: 200 x 70 x 55cm (78.7 x 27.6 x 21.7 inches) ◎ Package Size: 40 x 7 x 22cm (15.7 x 2.7 x 8.8 inches) ◎ Weight: 2.2lbs ◎ Support up: 440 lbs ◎ Material: 210T Waterproof Oxford cloth ◎ Color: Black,Blue,Red,Purple,Green,Pink ◎ Package Includes: Air Lounger Sleeping Sofa x 1,Carrying Bag x 1 How to use the air sleeping sofa: 【1】Open the charging port. 【2】Walk fast with the opening charging port,so that the air could be put in. 【3】Please repeat the step 1 & 2 for the other side of the mat 【4】After putting enough air, please tie up the mat ( connect one side to each other)-about 4-5 rounds, and then buckle up. 【5】Of course, it not only can be used outdoors, also can be used inside, you can take it to everywhere easily! ※ We suggest you search “How to set up inflatable sofa” in You Tube before you get started Warm tips: （Please read the following text before use ）: ☆ If it is windy outside, congratulations to you, you can be fast inflatable. ☆ It is more difficult to set up without any wind, you may need to run 10 meters ☆ 80% air is enough, the sealing strip roll at least 3 times or will be air leakage! ☆ When you have experience for it, you can set up air lazy bag in 10 seconds. ☆ Avoid sharp objects. Other Features: ◆ Most Relaxing Air Lounger - hottest prospect on the market ◆ Multi-layered material – lightweight, increased durability, easy-to-clean, odorless, dream series; ◆ It remains inflated for at least 5 hours. ◆ Our lounger sofa is made from a special fabric which is extremely lightweight, water-resistant, tough & environmentally friendly.
